summary: Test suite for the IoT data component, providing utilities to mock AWS IoT resources, handle pagination, and optionally verify AWS interactions, together with unit tests that exercise client connectivity, shadow management, delta calculations, message publishing, and server listing/publishing features using the Moto library.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of IoT data handling logic before deployment, ensuring that shadow operations, data publishing, and server endpoints work as expected with AWS IoT services.
